sfPLE.n: A: Notional payment: Payment to Expat by third party or overseas employer
B: Notional payment: Employment related security
D: Payment subject to Class 1 NICs but P11D/P9D for tax
E: Micro Employer using temporary "on or before" relaxation
F: No requirement to maintain a Deductions Working Sheet or Impractical to report work done on the day

sfField.formula: HYPERLINK("/"&LEFT(xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c, FIND(",", xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c)-1), RIGHT(xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c, LEN(xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c) - FIND(",", xcdhcm__EPS_status_system__c)))

HYPERLINK("/"&LEFT(xcdhcm__FPS_status_system__c, FIND(",", xcdhcm__FPS_status_system__c)-1), RIGHT(xcdhcm__FPS_status_system__c, LEN(xcdhcm__FPS_status_system__c) - FIND(",", xcdhcm__FPS_status_system__c)))

sfField.t: Allowance claimed prev period to date

sfField.formula:
MONTH(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) - 3
/* Correct at end of tax year */
+ IF(
 OR(
 MONTH(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) < 4,
 AND(
 MONTH(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) = 4,
 DAY(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) < 6)),
 12,
 0)
/* Correct for first part of a month */
- IF(DAY(xcdhcm__Pay_day__c) < 6, 1, 0)

BLANKVALUE(xcdhcm__SAP_recovered_this_period__c, 0.00) + 
BLANKVALUE(xcdhcm__ShPP_recovered_this_period__c, 0.00) + 
BLANKVALUE(xcdhcm__SMP_recovered_this_period__c, 0.00) + 
BLANKVALUE(xcdhcm__SPP_recovered_this_period__c, 0.00)
+ BLANKVALUE( xcdhcm__NIC_on_SAP_this_period__c , 0.00)
+ BLANKVALUE( xcdhcm__NIC_on_ShPP_this_period__c , 0.00)
+ BLANKVALUE( xcdhcm__NIC_on_SMP_this_period__c , 0.00)
+ BLANKVALUE( xcdhcm__NIC_on_SPP_this_period__c , 0.00)

sfRecordType.n: Final Bermuda Pay Run - Year End
Final Gross Pay Run - Year End
Final Net Pay Run - Year End
